message: Would it be possible to have an option for plain text notifications?  Some of us old fogies still use non-HTML-friendly e-mail reading apps...
+1, though my client supports HTML e-mails, I think sending a plain text alternative (or plain text only setting?) would be a great idea.
Hehe I also use plain text so I would add my voice to this request.
I also like this idea, as my phone handles plain text a little more easily than HTML.
